comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: May 11, 1914: National Memorial Service for the 17 U. S. sailors who died at Vera Cruz, Mexico, in April. Story in the New York Times, 5/11/14: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=940CE3DB173AE6...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Wystan, 

Thanks for your efforts with the numerous photographs which document the National Memorial Service of May 11, 1914. We will be able to better link the related images and expand the descriptions, including a date where one is not yet included.  (And on this one, we'll also fix the typo in the title!)
